Texto: 
not available
surgical removal most of skull base mass on right, followed by gamma knife therapy.
1. small extra-axial mass lying in interhemispheric fissure at base of frontal lobes.

2. large extra-axial dumbbell-shaped mass extending from the right cpa cistern across petrous apex and invading
right cavernous sinus.  mass contains large flow voids and enhances intensely and homogeneously.
meningioma, multiple
• meningioma
• metastatic disease
• chondrosarcoma
• trigeminal schwannoma
68 year old man with progressive hearing loss on right and right sided facial numbness.
